title: Potential RCE via Unchecked External Input
description: The code reads a configuration file and executes commands based on the content without proper validation or sanitization.
fix: Validate and sanitize all external inputs before processing them. Use parameterized queries or prepared statements to prevent command injection.

reasoning.pattern: Reading and executing commands from an external file without validation
reasoning.exploit_example: An attacker could modify the 'presets.conf' or 'favorites.conf' files to include malicious commands that would be executed by the application.
